app.title: BoardGame App
app.description: BoardGame data tool using BoardGameGeek API and pre-computed embeddings

search.title: Search by Game Name
search.input_placeholder: Enter the game name to search
search.view_details_info: Use 'Get Details by Game ID' to view detailed information.
search.input_error: Please enter a game name to search

details.title: Get Game Details by ID
details.input_placeholder: Enter the game ID to get details
details.yaml_updated: Mechanics, categories, and ranking settings have been updated
details.data_changed: There are differences between saved data and newly retrieved data.
details.update_success: Game data has been updated. YAML file has been overwritten with the latest information.
details.no_changes: No differences between saved data and newly retrieved data.

save.title: Save Game Data in YAML Format
save.filename_input: Filename to save (uses placeholder name if blank)
save.save_button: Save Selected Game Data to YAML
save.save_success: Game data saved to YAML file: {filepath}
save.special_char_error: Saving may fail if the game name contains special characters (: ; etc.).
save.no_data: No game data available for saving. Please search for a game and get its details first.

similarity.title: BoardGame Similarity Search
similarity.description: Application to search for boardgame similarity using pre-computed embeddings.
similarity.num_games: Number of similar games to display
similarity.no_similar_games: No games found with similarity above {threshold}. Try lowering the threshold.

analysis.no_categories: No category information for similar games
analysis.no_mechanics: No mechanics information for similar games

compare.title: Compare Multiple Games
compare.no_data: No saved game data. Please search and save games first.
compare.select_prompt: Games to compare (up to 6 can be selected)
compare.limit_warning: Display limited to 6 games. Showing the first 6.
